# Warcrimes – nuclear {#sec-warcrimes-nuclear}

::: {.callout-caution title="Myth"}
- Ukraine shelled their own nuclear power plants
- Russian shelling was legitimate because Ukraine hided weapons in nuclear facilities
[<br></br>![Search for topic in EUvsDisinfo](../all_common_img/EUvsDisinfo_400x240.jpg){height=2em}](https://euvsdisinfo.eu/disinformation-cases/?text=war%20crimes%20(nuclear%7Catom%7CZaporizhzhia%7CChernobyl)&sort=relevance)
:::

::: {.callout-tip title="Truth"}
Russia illegally shelled and occupied Ukrainian nuclear power plants
:::

The attack and seizure of nuclear infrastructure facilities, namely the Chornobyl Nuclear Power Plant and Zaporizhzhia Nuclear Power Plant, which took place on 24 February 2022 and 4 March 2022, is a direct violation of Article 56 of Protocol (I) to the Geneva Conventions of 1949 — Protection of Installations and Facilities Containing Dangerous Forces.
